did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Computer disk with a note from the artist, description of the project, and poster-sized installation diagram. The disk contains the CD-ROM version of the interactive installation Gating, in Eight Minutes Around the World.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Computer disk (CD-ROM) with a note from the artist, description of the project (two copies), and poster-sized installation diagram. The disk contains the CD-ROM version of the interactive installation Gating, in Eight Minutes Around the World. Set in several international airports, Gating concerns the intertwining of globalization and the expansion of new media. The work offers users a virtual reality that can be experienced as a game.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Rose Goldsen Archive of New Media Art.

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements:
phystech.p: System requirements for disk: color monitor, sound card, and ability to read Macromedia Director.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Per Pegelow. Gating Collection, #8236. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
